title.packages.description: Packages of the service used for purchasing credits, e.g., service offers 3 packages: $100 for 100 credits, $200 for 200 credits, $300 for 300 credits.

unit.credit.description: Credits used as virtual currency in API services.

unit.MB.description: MB stands for Megabyte, a unit of digital information storage.
